posts.post_content:
Hello everyone I know you guys are tired of my posts but it is time again for another request for any T210 Series 6 winchester players.  I currently have three cards and thankfully an original photo postcard of the winchester team thanks to a fellow board member.  If anyone has any T210 series 6 winchester players please message me through the board or at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  

As always thanks for the help in chasing down cards from my hometown team.

Tony Turner
